name: neptune-astro
title: Neptune Astro
desc: Neptune Astro - All-purpose website theme with 15 pages. Perfect for SaaS, startups, agencies, and more. Stand out with a stunning, professional design.
article:
Key Features:

  • Google PageSpeed Score 100/100 (Desktop)
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • 14+ Unique Pages
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel Configured
  • Google Map integrated
  • Multilingual Feature
  • Search Feature
  • Taxonomy support
  • Contact form support
  • Disqus Comments available
  • Support OG image
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Free Update and Lifetime Premium Support
  • Detail Documentation.

Pages:

  1. Homepage
  2. About
  3. Blog List
  4. Blog Single
  5. Case Studies List
  6. Case Studies Single
  7. Changelog
  8. Terms & Conditions
  9. Contact
  10. Category List
  11. Category Single
  12. Terms & Conditions
  13. Privacy Policy
  14. Elements
  15. 404 Page
